Html:
Hi Mikhail,

Is it possible to show some data markers on child y axis.

I need to show some thing like this.

http://cid-996b1960e19fab56.skydrive.live.com/self.aspx/Trend%20Snaps/MultipleYAxisArea.jpg

Regards

Ravi.

Hi Ravi,

Image you've posted in now missing, so please upload it again to give me more information about your intentions.

Best regards,

Mikhail.

Hi Mikhail,

can you check this link again, I can able to see this.

I need to show data markers on child vertical axes.

For example If I have two line graphs, I will add two extra vertical axis, Cursor coordinate graph is on in my applcation. If I move the mouse, I need to show the cooresponding y coordinate value at mouse postion as a data marker on child vertical axis.

Is there any possiblity to add data point marker on vertical axis. If I move mouse that point marker also should move.

Regards

Ravi.

Hi,

I think the thing you want can be reached in the following way:

1) create a plotter and put it into parent plotter's for example LeftPanel. If you need to have multiple axes, than you should remove each axis, create a parent grid, and add both axis and plotter to LeftPanel again.

2) add a ViewportHostPanel and add it to previously created plotter. Than add any shape to this hostPanel.

3) add a binding from main plotter's visible to your plotter's visible. Also you should use a viewportRestriction to limit x-panning of your marker.

That's it.

Best regards,

Mikhail.
